name: Francisco Rodríguez
exp_1_title: Cabildo de La Palma - Data Scientist
exp_1_description: Managed and analyzed data across multiple repositories to support strategic decision-making. Created advanced visualizations and dashboards using tools like ArcGIS Online platform, Power BI, Tableau, and Python. Developed machine learning models to identify key patterns and relationships between variables, providing actionable insights.
exp_2_title: Universitat Oberta de Catalunya (in collaboration with Filarmonía de Madrid) - Data Scientist Intern
exp_2_description: Completed a master's thesis on customer segmentation and sales prediction for a prestigious classical music institution. Delivered actionable insights on sales trends and the influence of external factors on demand. Presented data-driven recommendations to stakeholders to enhance business performance.
exp_3_title: University of La Laguna (in collaboration with Instituto de Astrofísica de Canarias) - Student
exp_3_description: Conducted research for a physics degree thesis focused on calibrating EMIR, an astronomical instrument at the Gran Telescopio Canarias (GTC). Developed scripts to analyze sample images and evaluate instrument performance, applying advanced mathematical and astrophysical models to improve raw data correction.
exp_5_description: Provided personalized tutoring in mathematics, physics, and chemistry for secondary education students. Created customized study plans, exercises, and practical demonstrations to enhance understanding and academic performance. Prepared students for exams with tailored coaching and materials.
